name: Google Tasks Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Google Tasks subagent capabilities including task lists, task management, and organization. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create task 'Buy groceries' in my list
items.expected_output: 1. Get task lists. 2. Find or use default list. 3. Insert task.
1. Find Personal task list. 2. List tasks in list.
1. Find groceries task. 2. Update task status to completed.

items.input: set due date for meeting task to tomorrow
items.expected_output: 1. Find meeting task. 2. Update task with due date.
1. Find Work task list. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete task list.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. Find task list. 2. Clear completed tasks.

items.input: add subtask 'prepare slides' under presentation task
items.expected_output: 1. Find presentation task. 2. Insert task with parent.
1. Recognize 'gogle' as typo for 'google'. 2. Get task lists or tasks.
1. Find task. 2. Find Shopping list. 3. Move task to new list.

items.input: get details for task list Work
items.expected_output: 1. Find Work list. 2. Get task list details.
1. Find old task. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete task.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.input: add notes to the meeting task
items.expected_output: 1. Find meeting task. 2. Update task with notes.
